description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.ja-ro: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

altTitles.ja: どく・どく・もり・もり

description.en: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.
description.es-la: En el bosque profundo, profundo. Tamagotake, un hada de los hongos que se ha quedado sola en el mundo después de que mataran a sus padres, persigue al culpable, Tsukiyotake, para vengarse de él. En el Mar de árboles, donde la vida y la muerte se cruzan, ¿podrá el joven Tamago vengarse del odiado Tsukiyo? Comienza un suspenso de hongos sin precedentes.

altTitles.ja: 天下第一人

description.en:
Soma, an errand boy in Hwakgol, is assigned to protect the city from evil souls.   
  
"I have to protect the Hwakgol from the terrifying threat of evil souls.   
But can I protect it… can I?"

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/tianxiadiyiren/list?title_no=1586)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001205)
description.ja:
なんでも屋のソーマ、至高の武を極める旅が始まる！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/tianxiadiyiren/list?title_no=1586)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001205)
description.ko:
걸렸다하면 영혼까지 탈탈 털어
참교육 시켜주시는 화악골 심부름꾼, 소마.
가공할 마령성의 위협으로부터 화악골을 지켜야 하는데...

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/tianxiadiyiren/list?title_no=1586)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001205)
description.ru:
Он шел, без остановки, шел по своему пути, три года спустя он перестал оставлять следы, на четвертом году он мог ходить по воде, на пятый год он ходил по воздуху, он шел и сметал всех врагов со своего пути, не погода, ни огонь, ни вода не могли его остановить, кроме одного, конца пути, неужели весь его путь так легко закончится, что же будет после того самого конца?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/tianxiadiyiren/list?title_no=1586)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001205)
description.zh:
竟让笨拙的他守护花乐谷？
没想到他却是武林高手！
武功高深莫测且来历不明的他，受命驻守保护花乐谷，抵御恐怖魔灵城的攻击。但随着白初雅的到来，花乐谷的平静被打破！不速之客的接连现身，他能守住花乐谷吗？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/tianxiadiyiren/list?title_no=1586)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001205)

title.en: The Ruins of the Fire that Bind Us

altTitles.ja: 結ばる焼け跡

altTitles.ja-ro: Musubaru Yakeato

description.en:
1945, Ueno. The souls of those that lost everything burst at the ruins left by the war.  
  
Kanekichi, a war orphan who lost his family continues to struggle in despair.  
But upon meeting a mysterious young man, Kanaida, the boy's heart starts unraveling …?

title.en: Kusobitch na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusobitch na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Bitchy Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

altTitles.ja: 未確認で進行形　【みかくにんの村のおはなし】

description.es-la: Spin-off de "Mikakunin de Shinkoukei". Acerca de la vida cotidiana de los personajes en un universo paralelo donde Benio es la alcaldesa de la villa que todos habitan.

altTitles.ja: 彼女のそれにやられてる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanojo no Sore ni Yarareteru

altTitles.en: I'm Being Done In By Those Things Of Hers

description.en: A gloomy boy suddenly getting close with the popular track and field club ace?! A short comedy about invading someone else's spot to skip class is about to begin!!
description.pt-br: Um rapaz sombrio de repente se aproximando do popular ás do clube de atletismo?! Uma comédia curta sobre invadir o espaço de outra pessoa para escapar das aulas está prestes a começar!!

title.en: Nuigurumi Mitaidatta Tonari no Osananajimi ga Shinshin Tomoni Oshi Tsubushite Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ぬいぐるみみたいだった隣の幼馴染が心身ともに押し潰してくる話

altTitles.en: The Story of My Childhood Friend Next Door Who Used to Be Adorable Like a Doll, Now Breaks Me Both Physically and Mentally

altTitles.ja: ゴールデンカムイ カラー版

description.en: A tale of high adventure and survival on the Japanese frontier!   In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi Sugimoto searches the wilderness of the Japanese frontier of Hokkaido for a hoard of hidden gold. With only a cryptic map and a native Ainu girl to help him, Saichi must also deal with every murderous cutthroat, bandit and rogue who knows about the treasure!

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of the Demon King

altTitles.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of Demon King

description.en: A female assassin from the modern era transmigrates into a cheesy Western-themed fantasy otome game and needs to make the Demonic male leads fall in love with her in order to save the world. Bent on returning to reality, she begins to train the assassination skills of the evil second female lead, Lisa, in the hope that Lisa will kill her, but because of her stubbornly silly personality and various types of ambiguous physical contact, she made Lisa fall in love with her?

altTitles.ja: 不敗剣仙

description.en:
A weak and sickly boy, Sung Woo-mun's condition worsens when he loses his mental capacities, owing to a painting gifted by a sage. He grows up as the 'village idiot', pitied by his own parents. But unbeknownst to everyone, his life is about to change soon, and a new destiny awaits him. When Sung Woo-mun turns 20, not only does he have an epiphany, but an undefeatable martial arts power begins to bloom inside the painting. What could all of this mean for Woo Mun? And what strange world awaits him?

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B6%88%ED%8C%A8%EA%B2%80%EC%84%A0/1985)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/47151)
description.ja: 旅籠屋の長男に生まれた「宋愚問」 「愚問」は体が弱い兄と違って、弟の「愚強」だけ華山派に入門してすることになった。 二人の初年の運命が枝分かれしたあの日…仙人が飲食代の代わりに山水画を描いてくれた後、山水画に酔いしれ続けた「愚問」は健康を取り戻したが、バカになってしまった。 二十歳になった日！ 「愚問」知らないうちに無限の武功を身につくようになったがーー
description.ko:
시골 객점의 아들 송우문.
어릴 적부터 몸이 약했던 그는
어느 날 노도사가 그려 주고 간
산수화를 보고 바보가 된다.

그렇게 동네에선 바보라 놀림받고
부모에겐 한심한 아들로 자라지만

스무 살이 되던 날!
각성과 함께 산수화 속 절대무공을 꽃피운다!
description.ru: Сон Вумун, сын деревенщины, с самого рождения был слабым. Однажды, увидев как художник рисовал пейзаж, он потерял рассудок. Каждый в деревне издевался над его глупостью. Но вот ему исполнилось двадцать и он станет настоящим мастером боевых искусств!

description.en: Army veteran's last go at the obstacle course turns lethal after a simple fall. A goddess presents an opportunity at new life as a hero! The protagonist ain't having any of it, he was supposed to retire and become a civilian. The arrogant Goddess drops him down to survive while having her own evil schemes. How will his new life progress after encountering another Goddess, a spy and his past life's junior?

altTitles.ja: 正反対なわたしたち

altTitles.ja-ro: Sei Hantai na Danjo to Inu no Deai
Seihantai na Watashitachi
Seihantai na Watashi-tachi

altTitles.en: Encounter Between Polar Opposites and Their Dogs

description.en:
A man and a woman with opposite personalities and two dogs meet while out for a walk.

 Fluffy small dog x chattering boyfriend,
 Scary big dog x Powerful girlfriend...
 There is no doubt that you will be warmed by the gap moe that fills the screen!!
In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.

Jian Chen, the publicly recognized number one expert of the Jianghu. His skill with the sword went beyond perfection and was undefeatable in battle, After a battle with the exceptional expert Dugu Qiubai who had gone missing over a hundred years ago, Jian Chen succumbed to his injuries and died. After death, Jian Chen’s spirit was transmigrated into a completely foreign world. Following an extremely fast growth, his enemies piled up one after another before becoming gravely injured once more. On the gates of death, his spirit had mutated, and from that moment henceforth, he would tread on a completely different path of the art of the sword to become the sword god of his generation

Unknowingly swapped upon birth, Princess Brianna lost her identity as a princess and became a vagrant orphan. One day, her Imperial Father suddenly sought her back, reinstating her back to her rightful identity as the nation's princess. However, what awaited her was not a family reunion nor was it an extravagant life, but instead, she was to become a sacrifice for the god. Reincarnated into the body of Princess Brianna, our main character only wants to change her fate of death, yet realises that the best way to do so is to become the sacrifice. The only way she can live is by becoming the sacrifice, as hidden scheming along with its causes and effects, slowly unravel in front of her eyes. (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)

altTitles.en: Convenience Store Worker From Another World

description.en: The protagonist Chan, who was looking for a part-time job after his previous company went bankrupt, coincidentally discovers a convenience store. Lured by the very high hourly wage, he decides to become a part-timer from that day. But the customers who come in seem a bit strange. Vampires, kobolds, and even succubi??
description.pt-br: O protagonista Chan, que estava procurando um trabalho de meio período depois que sua empresa anterior faliu, descobre por acaso uma loja de conveniência. Atraído pelo salário por hora extremamente alto, ele decide começar a trabalhar lá a partir daquele dia. Mas os clientes que entram parecem um pouco estranhos. Vampiros, kobolds e até succubus??

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.ja-ro: Make Hiroin ga Oosugiru! @comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

description.en:
Kang Hyeon, who was ashamed of his poor family, cut off ties with those around him and studied desperately to achieve success, but eventually he realized that his ideals were wrong.
To make matters worse, Hyeon, who has cancer, gets run over while trying to save someone who fell on the subway tracks, and returns to the past while listening to the melody of a symphony.
Hyeon, who was determined not to live the same life as before, realizes that he has tremendous musical talent...

altTitles.ja: エンディング メーカー

altTitles.fr: Les Créateurs d'une Fin qui les Arrange

description.en:
After "outboxer009" wakes up in the body of Yuder Bayel from Legend of Heroes 2, he soon discovers that his rival "sandstorm" has also entered the game world as Cordelia Chace. 

These top-two-ranked old pros come to realize that navigating this game world is much harder than just pointing and clicking. With the apocalyptic conclusion of the game looming before them, they'll have to combine his quick wit, her foul mouth, and both their gamer mindsets to make a new, less cataclysmic ending.

Note: Chapter 1 very closely resembles the PROMO chapter.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)
description.ko:
게임 영웅전기2의 고이다 못해 썩은물인 두 사람.
만년 1등 '아웃복서009'와 만년 2등인 '노란폭풍'.
어느 날, 두 사람은 게임 속에서 눈을 뜨는데…….

“야… 너두?”
“야… 나두!”

영웅전기2의 결말은 세계의 멸망.

하지만 혼자가 아닌 둘이라면.
그것도 서버 랭킹 1위와 2위가 함께라면!

완벽한 해피 엔딩을 위한 썩은물들의 행보가 시작된다!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)
description.ru:
Два профессиональных игрока в игре "Легенда Героев 2": Кан Чжин Хо - Первый в мировом топе и Хон Ю Хи - вторая в мировом топе, однажды открыли глаза и оказались внутри своей любимой игры в телах игровых персонажей.

- Эй, и ты... тоже?

- Д-да, и я...

Финалом "Легенды Героев 2 " является разрушение человеческого мира. 
Однако, если они не одни... если топ 1 и топ 2 мира вместе... то... Они вновь пройдут по протоптанному пути с намерениями добиться "Хорошей Концовки"!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)
description.pt-br:
Dois heróis platinaram o jogo Legend of Heroes 2. Kang Jinho sendo o jogador top 1, e a Hong YuHee logo atrás no top 2. Um dia, eles abriram os olhos e se encontraram dentro do corpo de seus personagens desse jogo…

“Ei… você também?”

“Calma… por que você tá aqui?”

O fim de Legend of Heroes 2 era a destruição de toda a humanidade.

Mas se tiver dois deles que não estejam sozinhos e que sejam o top 1 e 2 do jogo, havia esperança.

E esse é o início de duas maçãs podres em busca de um final perfeito!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)

altTitles.ja: 干物妹！うまるちゃん
HIMOUTO! UMARUCHAN

description.en:
My little sister Umaru (age 16) is a renowned beautiful girl in the town. A perfect sister with a kind heart, high scores and popularity, that everybody admires…  
  
Or at least that's what people believe, but once she walks in her room, she becomes…
description.pt-br:
Minha irmã Umaru (16 anos) é uma linda e renomada garota da cidade. Uma irmã perfeita com um coração bondoso, pontuações altas e popularidade, que todos admiram…

Ou pelo menos é o que as pessoas acreditam, mas uma vez que ela entra em seu quarto, ela se torna...

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.en: I Want To See You Blush

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

title.en: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita

altTitles.ja: 理系が恋に落ちたので証明してみた。
リケ恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei Shite Mita
RikeKoi

altTitles.en: Science Fell in Love, so I Tried to Prove It
I Tried to Prove That Science Fell in Love
Science Has Fallen in Love, so We Tried to Prove It

altTitles.fr: J'ai essayé de prouver que la science était tombée amoureuse

altTitles.ru: Наука влюблена и мы докажем это
Учёные влюблены и намерены доказать это научно
Я пытался доказать, что наука влюбилась

altTitles.th: พิสูจน์นิยามความรักด้วยหลักวิชาสายวิทย์

altTitles.zh: 理科生坠入情网，故尝试证明。
试证明理科生已坠入情网。

altTitles.zh-hk: 理科生墜入情網，故嘗試證明。
試證明理科生已墜入情網。

description.en: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
description.ru: Химуро Аямэ и Юкимура Шинья ну просто обожают точные науки. Им надо, чтобы всё имело научное обоснование, ведь без этого нельзя быть уверенным ни в чём. Ох уж эти ученые, какие только эксперименты не придут в эти головы, чтобы доказать "любовь".

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.ja: 財閥家の末息子

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.
description.ko:
제발 안경 쓴 아저씨는 건들지 말자.
오직 자신의 딸 '민지'를 위해 특수요원직을 관두고 평범함을 선택한 가장 김부장.
그러던 어느 날 민지가 소리소문 없이 사라지고, 김부장은 자신을 감시하는 국가를 적으로 돌리면서까지 딸을 찾아나서기 시작하는데...
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학] 그리고 [인생존망]을 잇는 박태준 유니버스의 공식 스핀오프 작품!
description.ru:
Пожалуйста, не трогайте мужчину в очках.
Менеджер Ким, глава семьи, который бросил работу специализированного агента и выбрал простую жизнь ради своей дочери Мин Джи.
Однажды в один прекрасный день Мин Джи исчезает, не говорив ни слова , и менеджер Ким начинает искать свою дочь, постепенно превращая страну, которая следит за ним, во врага...
description.pt-br: Pai solteiro, gerente de companhia e ex membro das forças especiais. O Sr. Kim vivia uma vida normal até sua filha, Minji, desaparecer. Depois de descobrir que ela poderia estar morta, o Sr. Kim parte em uma busca implacável por informações. Ele irá resgatar Minji a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique destruir tudo e todos que cruzarem seu caminho.

description.en:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

title.en: Kyouran Reijou Nia Liston - Byoujaku Reijou ni Tensei shita Kamigoroshi no Bujin no Karei Naru Musouroku

altTitles.ja: 凶乱令嬢ニア・リストン 病弱令嬢に転生した神殺しの武人の華麗なる無双録

altTitles.en: Brutal Daughter Nia Liston: A Splendid Matchless Record of a God-Slaying Warrior Reincarnated as a Sickly Daughter

altTitles.vi: Cuồng loạn lệnh nương - Nia Liston

description.en:
The strongest reincarnated daughter goes on the rampage! A gripping, otherworldly entertainment!

"I wanted to die fighting anyway."

The great hero, who once even killed a god, wanted to fight even in death. What awaited her was her reincarnation as a sickly noblewoman. In the future world, she becomes the beautiful but too weak Daughter Nia Liston, but in her second life, she goes on a rampage in battle, in delivery activities and in academy life!

This is a record of the brilliant battles of the hero who will eventually be known as the "Wicked Rampant Daughter". The most powerful Warriors' Daughter presents the start of a painful otherworldly entertainment!

title.en: N Methods to Make the Scum Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zha Nan Gameover De N Zhong Fang Fa

altTitles.vi: Tôi Ở Di Giới Khai Ngư Đường
N Cách Để Khiến Tra Nam Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhā Nán Gameover De N Zhǒng Fāng Fǎ

description.en: I fell from a building strangely when I appeared? Am I dead or alive after falling from the 18th floor? Suddenly an NPC wanted to play a game with me? I quickly traveled to various novels, met a lot of handsome men, activated the cheat code to kill all the scum, and completed the mission in the other world to come back to life? Wait a minute! Why am I in hard mode when I first arrive? !

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.ja-ro: Waka-chan wa Kyou mo Azatoi

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

description.en:
South Korea is filled with various shitty laws.
The group of ‘juvenile kids’ that made my life into a living hell didn’t receive any punishment: these kids were the result of these shitty laws. I’ll now start my revenge.
description.kk:
Оңтүстік Корея әртүрлі заңдарға толы.
Менің өмірімді тозаққа айналдырған "жас балалар" тобы ешқандай жазаға тартылмады: бұл балалар осы заңдардың нәтижесі болды. Енді мен кек алуды бастаймын.
description.ko:
대한민국은 X같은 법들로 가득하다
나를 지옥으로 밀어넣고도 처벌받지 않았던 ‘촉법소년’들
그 X같은 법의 결과물들에게, 지금부터 복수를 시작한다
description.es-la: Corea del Sur está llena de leyes de mierda. El grupo de «menores» que convirtió mi vida en un infierno no recibió ningún castigo: esos menores fueron el resultado de esas leyes de mierda. Ahora comenzaré mi venganza. (Ocurre en el mismo universo de Lookism)
description.pt-br:
A Coreia do Sul está cheia de leis de merda.
E os ‘deliquentes’ que me empurraram para o inferno nunca foram punidos.
Então, está na hora de me vingar e passar por cima dessas leis de merda.

description.en:
Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

title.en: Stepping on the Scumbag to Be the Master of Gods

description.en: Others bind the system to quickly travel through levels and fight the BOSS. When it comes to Li Anan, she is the BOSS! The scumbag is in a high position? Li Anan directly crushes him: "Kneel down!" The bitch is deeply scheming? Li Anan taunted at full level: "Just This?" Holding the Lord God System in hand, Li Anan blocks the killing gods all the way, kills the scumbag men and tortures the scumbag girls, and saves the love brain. He is bound to fight back to the world terminal and regain the Godhead of the Creator God! With this one, he will be the only one in the world!

altTitles.ja: 王子様の友達
学園の王子様とハグする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen no Ouji-sama to Hagu suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story About Hugging the School Prince

altTitles.pt-br: A história sobre abraçar o príncipe da escola

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.ja-ro: 叛逆（はんぎゃく）のニジガサキ

altTitles.ja: 反逆のニジガサキ

description.en: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
description.es-la: Las locuras y bizarras jornadas de Nijigasaki, ahora llegan en formato manga. Sigue las rebeldes aventuras de Setsuna Yuki y el Club Escolar Idol de Nijigasaki en Hangyaku no Nijigasaki.

title.en: NEET dakedo Hello Work ni Ittara Isekai ni Tsuretekareta

altTitles.en: I'm a NEET but when I went to Hello Work I got taken to another world

altTitles.ru: Я NEET, но когда пошёл устраиваться на работу, попал в иной мир

altTitles.ja: ニートだけどハロワにいったら異世界につれてかれた

altTitles.zh: 尼特族的异世界就职记

description.en:
The 23-year-old NEET Masaru Yamano went to Hello Work and found an interesting job offer. 
 
_"A sword and sorcery fantasy, playtest for Miniature Garden of Razgrad World. Extended period of time, preferred to be able to live on-site. Monthly salary of 250,000+ yen."_ 
 
He immediately goes to the interview and signs a contract. However, the place of employment is another world. Because of the contract, he’s taken there. To survive, Masaru receives a cheat, but he is told the shocking truth: the world will be destroyed in 20 years! Can a simple NEET prevent the destruction of the world?!
description.ru:
23-летний безработный Ямано Масару отправился в Hello Work и нашёл интересное предложение работы.  
«Тестовая игра в маленьком саду «Мир Разград». Срок работы длительный, с проживанием на рабочем месте. Оплата: 250 000 иен + комиссия.»  
Пройдя собеседование и подписав договор, Масару попадает на место своей новой работы — другой мир! Согласно договору, Масару получил особую способность, а вскоре узнал шокирующую правду: «этот мир будет уничтожен через 20 лет». Сможет ли простой безработный предотвратить разрушение мира?!

title.en: Demon King of the Royal Class

altTitles.en: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy

altTitles.es-la: El Principe Demonio va a la Academia

altTitles.ja: 魔王様は学園に行く

description.en:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?

title.en: Houkago no Idol ni wa Himitsu ga aru

altTitles.en: The After School Idol Has a Secret

altTitles.ja: 放課後のアイドルには秘密がある

altTitles.ru: У школьных айдолов есть свои секреты

altTitles.zh: 放学后的偶像有一个秘密

altTitles.zh-ro: Fàngxué hòu de ǒuxiàng yǒu yīgè mìmì

description.en:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?
description.ja: 僕のクラスには、正真正銘のアイドルがいる」超エリート校に進学した高校一年生の昼野は、入学最初の学力テストで記入ミスにより赤点を出し補習を受けることになる。しかし、その補習にはもう一人参加者がいて…？

altTitles.ru: Гарем рабов в лабиринте другого мира

altTitles.ja: 異世界迷宮でハーレムを

altTitles.en: A Harem in the Fantasy World Dungeon
Harem in the Labyrinth of Another World

description.en: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.
description.ja:
少年のチートでハーレムな冒険譚が始まる!!
「人生なんてこんなもん――」。世の中に絶望した少年が見つけたとあるサイト。この世界で生きづらいなら異世界で生きてやれ、とクリックした先は、ホントに異世界!? しかもボーナスポイントを振りまくったおかげで最強の男に生まれ変わった彼は、アイドル級の美少女を手に入れる権利を得られそうで…!? 生まれ変わった少年のチートでハーレムな冒険が今始まる！
description.pt-br: Um homem estava prestes a cometer suicídio e decide procurar uma maneira de morrer na internet, mas depois encontrou um site estranho que fez muitas perguntas e teve um sistema baseado em pontos que permite que você crie várias habilidades para um personagem . Ele se interessou por isso e, quando ele acabou de definir o seu personagem, lhe foi perguntado: Você será agora transportado para um mundo com as configurações que você escolher, voltar não é possível, você ainda aceita?. Então, sem pensar muito, ele Pressionou SIM e encontrou-se em outro mundo com as habilidades que escolheu ter.

altTitles.ja-ro: Higanjima Saigo no 47 Hiai
Higanjima Saigo no 47 Nichikan

altTitles.ja: 彼岸島 最後の47日間

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด - 47วันสุดท้ายสู่หายนะ

description.en:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!
description.fr:
Akira et la résistance humaine sont parvenus à conquérir le temple fortifié où résidait Miyabi. Alors que les derniers survivants profitent d'un repos de quelques jours bien mérité, un groupe d'étudiants échoue sur l'île d'Higanjima après avoir été attaqué par les démons marins. Ryosuke, Kasumi et Yamaoka vont très rapidement découvrir la cruauté sans limite des vampires.  
  
Miyabi, de son côté, ne compte pas en rester là et se prépare à attaquer le Japon directement grâce au nouveau moyen qu'il a trouvé pour vamprisier un maximum d'humain en un temps record. Son plan nécessite cependant 47 jours avant de pouvoir être mis en oeuvre.

altTitles.ja: Kisu Shite Kurenakya Shinjau

altTitles.en: Your Kiss is the Only Medicine

altTitles.ja: キスしてくれなきゃ死んじゃう

description.en: Yuuta Sato accidentally discovers that childhood friend Rinko Uenohara contracted a very rare illness called the "Kissing Disease". The disease forces the person to kiss someone of the opposite sex at regular intervals or die! Yuuta decides that he is going to keep her alive no matter what. Will he succeed? What will the others think when they find out about the two!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyakusatsu Happiendo

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

altTitles.ja: 紫雲寺家の子供たち

description.ar: قصر فاخر في أفضل مكان بطوكيو. يعيشُ سبعة أشقاء من عائلة شيونجي، وجميعهم جميلونَ للغاية. ونرى مغامرة أراتا العائلية بين صراع إيجاد الذات والوصول إلى أهدافهِ كونهُ الابن الأكبر للعائلة
description.en: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won’t stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji “siblings” and knocks Arata’s world off its axis…
description.ja:
東京都世田谷区成城。都内有数の高級住宅街に豪邸を構える「紫雲寺家」。
７人の兄弟姉妹、特に５人の美人姉妹が有名となっているが、長男の男子高校生・新は姉妹にタジタジの毎日。
「もし自分に姉妹がいなかったら…」と、ついそんな妄想もしてしまう日々の中、父親から衝撃の事実を告げられて…？
description.pt-br: O amor entre irmão e irmã. O amor entre homem e mulher. Aquilo que é mais proibido é mais inabalável. Os dois filhos e as cinco filhas da família Shiunji brilham como pedras preciosas, cada um com inteligência e beleza incoparáveis. E com o pedigree de seu rico pai por trás deles, como poderiam não ser o assunto da cidade? O filho mais velho, Arata, passou a vida sendo infernizado pelos caprichos de suas deslumbrantes irmãs, mas nenhuma  provocação iria o impedir de valorizar sua família acima de tudo e de todos. Mas quando sua irmã mais nova completa quinze anos, seu pai revela um segredo há muito escondido dos "irmãos" Shiunji e vira o mundo de Arata de cabeça para baixo...

altTitles.ru: Рамия-Яна: Хроники Героя и Повелителя Демонов

altTitles.tr: Ramia-Yana; Kahraman ve İblis Lordu Günlükleri

altTitles.es-la: Ramia-Yana: Crónicas de la heroína Ramia & Lord de los Demonios

description.en:
Each time a Demon Lord has appeared, a human hero has slain it, pushing back the demons in the dark lands. 
As the cycle starts over again, a mysterious ancient hero called Ramia reappears. Meanwhile, an abnormal Demon army suddenly strikes the kingdom…
description.fr:
L'histoire fantastique de l'excentrique et mystérieuse héroïne Ramia et des démons qui s'opposent à elle.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/TheGoldenSmurf)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10669208)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/thegoldensmurf)
description.id:
Setiap kali seorang Raja Iblis memunculkan diri, seorang bahadur manusia telah tampak ’tuk menakluknya, mendorong mundur para iblis ke negeri gulita.
Dengan mulainya lagi daurnya, seorang bahadur kuno misterius bernama Ramia muncul kembali. Sementara itu, sebuah laskar Iblis taknormal tiba-tiba menyerang kerajaannya...
description.ru: Фэнтезийный эпос, посвященный необычному и таинственному герою по имени Рамия.
description.tr:
Ne zaman bir İblis Lordu ortaya çıksa, bir insan kahraman onu öldürerek karanlık topraklardaki iblisleri geri püskürtmüştür.
Döngü yeniden başlarken, Ramia adında gizemli bir antik kahraman yeniden ortaya çıkar. Bu sırada, anormal bir İblis ordusu aniden krallığa saldırır...
description.es-la:
Cada vez que aparecía un Lord de los Demonios, un héroe humano lo eliminaba, haciendo retroceder a los demonios a las tierras oscuras.
Mientras el ciclo empieza una vez más, una antigua y misteriosa heroína llamada Ramia reaparece. Y mientras tanto, un ejército anormal de Demonios azota repentinamente al reino...

title.en: Ore wa Subete o “Parry” Suru ~Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai~

altTitles.ja: 俺は全てを【パリイ】する　～逆勘違いの世界最強は冒険者の夢をみる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore wa Subete o “Parry” Suru: Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai

altTitles.en: I Parry Everything: What Do You Mean I’m the Strongest? I’m Not Even an Adventurer Yet!
I Parry All ~With A Reverse Misunderstanding, The World's Strongest Dreams Of Being An Adventurer~

altTitles.uk: Я "парирую" всё: Сильнейший человек в мире хочет стать авантюристом
Я парировал все время, чтобы стать сильнейшим авантюристом

description.en:
Ever since he was a young boy, Noor has wanted to be like the adventurers in his father’s stories — dragonslayers, cursebreakers, heroes who always save the day. But as everyone knows, to be an adventurer, you’ve gotta have the right skills! 

Unfortunately for Noor, his [Parry] is bottom-of-the-barrel useless, his prospects are nonexistent, and everybody he knows is telling him to throw in the towel. Faced with this harsh reality, he figures there’s only one thing to do: make up for it with effort! An intense, solitary training regimen ought to do it. If one year won’t cut it, he’ll train for five! If not five, ten! 

Now facing the tail end of his twenties with no new skills to show for his labors, Noor sets out to become an adventurer anyway, determined to try one last time to make his dream come true. He might be clueless when it comes to adventuring, but he’s no stranger to hard work! 

Now, if only he can figure out why everyone keeps looking at him like that...
 
---
 
Original Web Novel: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/>
description.pt-br: Desde que era um menino, Noor queria ser como os aventureiros das histórias de seu pai — matadores de dragões, quebradores de maldições, heróis que sempre salvam o dia. Mas, como todos sabem, para ser um aventureiro, é preciso ter as habilidades certas!Infelizmente para Noor, sua [Parry] é completamente inútil, suas perspectivas são inexistentes, e todos que ele conhece estão dizendo para ele desistir. Diante dessa dura realidade, ele percebe que só há uma coisa a fazer: compensar isso com esforço! Um intenso regime de treinamento solitário deve resolver. Se um ano não for suficiente, ele treinará por cinco! Se não forem cinco, dez!Agora, ao final dos seus vinte e poucos anos, sem novas habilidades para mostrar pelo seu trabalho árduo, Noor decide se tornar um aventureiro mesmo assim, determinado a tentar uma última vez para realizar seu sonho. Ele pode não saber nada sobre aventuras, mas não é estranho ao trabalho duro! Agora, se ele apenas conseguir descobrir por que todos continuam olhando para ele daquele jeito..

description.en:
Princess Turandot is the cynosure of the Chinese Empire, and she knows it. Thus, she states she'll only marry a man of royal blood who solves her three riddles, on pain of death for failing. After many princes meet their unfortunate end by taking the challenge, enter Prince Calaf of Tartary, who's instantly besotted, and who vows to finally defeat the cold princess and win her heart.

A reimagining of Giacomo Puccini's opera, "Turandot".

--- 
TL/N: We know that "nessun dorma" translates as "let no one sleep", but the way the author mistranslated the title in Korean is a common mistake.
